name: P2P Topdown Template
description:
P2P Topdown Template

A template for a multiplayer topdown shooter game. Don't let the aliens abduct your cows!

Controls:

- movement: WASD

- fire: left mouse button

Please make sure that you're using two devices (the template does have mobile support). The P2P feature WILL NOT WORK CORRECTLY if you're switching between browser tabs.
